bigshot

Class Point3DTransform

  • java.lang.Object
    • bigshot.Point3DTransform

  • public class Point3DTransform
extends Object
    A 3x3 matrix transform.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Point3DTransform()
      Creates a new transform and initializes it to the identity transform.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void prepend(double[][] xform)
      Multiplies this transform from the left with another transform.
      void rotateX(double angle)
      Prepends a rotation around the X axis.
      void rotateY(double angle)
      Prepends a rotation around the Y axis.
      void rotateZ(double angle)
      Prepends a rotation around the Z axis.
      Point3D transform(Point3D input)
      In-place transforms a 3d point.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Point3DTransform

        public Point3DTransform()
        Creates a new transform and initializes it to the identity transform.

    • Method Detail

      • prepend

        public void prepend(double[][] xform)
        Multiplies this transform from the left with another transform. (this = xform * this).

      • rotateX

        public void rotateX(double angle)
        Prepends a rotation around the X axis.
        Parameters:
        angle - the angle in radians

      • rotateY

        public void rotateY(double angle)
        Prepends a rotation around the Y axis.
        Parameters:
        angle - the angle in radians

      • rotateZ

        public void rotateZ(double angle)
        Prepends a rotation around the Z axis.
        Parameters:
        angle - the angle in radians

      • transform

        public Point3D transform(Point3D input)
        In-place transforms a 3d point.
        Parameters:
        input - the point to transform. This point will be mutated - no new Point3D object is created.
        Returns:
        the input point after it has been transformed
